log.text: Cast Cure Wounds using 2nd level slot
Cast Healing Word using 2nd level slot

inventory.name: Quarterstaff
inventory.description: Acts as Druidic Focus. 1d6 one-handed, 1d8 two-handed.

inventory.name: Star Map
inventory.description: Spellcasting focus from Circle of Stars. Grants Guidance cantrip and free Guiding Bolt casts (4/long rest).

sessions.name: Session 1
sessions.content:
Woke up on a meteor, nautili ship broken in front of me. Remembering parts of the attack, green-yellow skinned specie, cutting off the heads of the mindflare. 

Hearing a magical message in my head, projected from a ship that came close to inspect the area. 
Meteor got hooked and met my new party member. The meteor got moved into the nautili, meeting more party members in the ship.

We found mindflares with heads cut off and missing. Found a prisoner who was still alive, bonobo or what his name was, I am not a fan of him. We explored a bit more, I collected some strange bugs that got burned, but looked useful.

battles.name: Battle - 10/02/2026 (2 rounds)

log.text: Cast Cure Wounds using 2nd level slot
Cast Healing Word using 2nd level slot

battles.content:
Woke up on a meteor, nautili ship broken in front of me. Remembering parts of the attack, green-yellow skinned specie, cutting off the heads of the mindflare. 

Hearing a magical message in my head, projected from a ship that came close to inspect the area. 
Meteor got hooked and met my new party member. The meteor got moved into the nautili, meeting more party members in the ship.

We found mindflares with heads cut off and missing. Found a prisoner who was still alive, bonobo or what his name was, I am not a fan of him. We explored a bit more, I collected some strange bugs that got burned, but looked useful.

other.name: Spelljammer ships
other.content: Spelljammer ships don’t have a weel to control the ship. They uses chair that control the ship

other.name: Player: Kai sunborn (Monk)
other.content:
Race: Monkey
Size: Normal
Position: Front line damage

Extra info:
- fire is his specialty 
- curious and doesn’t like standing still

other.name: Player: Duke shystalker (wizard)
other.content:
Race: Rabbit
Size: Small
Role: ranged magic damage

Extra information:
- Always searching for loot
- can go ahead of the team
- fireball!!

other.name: Player: Dawan Andoly (artificer)
other.content:
Race: Gnome
Size: Small
Role: support front line

Extra information:
- Can make things
- bit oblivious

gear.name: Backpack
gear.desc: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items to the outside.

gear.name: Bedroll
gear.desc: A sleeping bag for keeping warm and dry while camping outdoors. Roll it up and strap to backpack.

gear.name: Mess Kit
gear.desc: A tin box containing a plate, cup, and eating utensils (fork, spoon, knife). The lid doubles as a cooking pan.

gear.name: Tinderbox
gear.desc: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder. Using it to light a torch takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

gear.name: Torch
gear.desc: Burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. Can be used as improvised weapon (1 fire damage).

gear.name: Rations
gear.desc: Dried, preserved food sufficient for one day. Consists of jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

gear.name: Waterskin
gear.desc: A leather pouch that holds up to 4 pints of liquid. One pint of water per day prevents dehydration.

gear.name: Hempen Rope
gear.desc: Has 2 HP and can be burst with DC 17 Strength check. Can be cut into smaller lengths for various uses.

gear.name: Tent (2-person)
gear.desc: A canvas shelter that accommodates two Medium creatures. Takes 10 minutes to set up or break down.

gear.name: Traveler's Clothes
gear.desc: A set of durable, practical clothes for traveling: boots, trousers, shirt, vest, belt, and cloak.

gear.name: Quiver
gear.desc: A leather container that holds up to 20 arrows or bolts.

gear.name: Herbalism Kit
gear.desc: This kit contains pouches for herbs, clippers, mortar and pestle, glass jars, and distilling equipment.
uses: Identify plants with Herbalism Kit check
Create healing potion (DC 15, 25 gp materials, 1 day)
Forage for medicinal herbs in the wild
gear.checks: Medicine, Nature, Survival - add proficiency bonus when using kit for these checks

gear.name: Cartographer's Tools
gear.desc: These tools include a quill, ink, parchment, compass, calipers, and ruler.
uses: Create accurate maps of areas you explore
Determine your position on a map
gear.checks: Nature, Survival, Investigation - add proficiency bonus when using tools for these checks

gear.name: Burned bug residu (pouch)
gear.desc: Strange burned bug part found a nautili ship.
